title: Hey, I’m Alexei, a Data Analyst Who Loves Turning Data Into Stories
text:
Hey, I’m Alexei, a Data Analyst Who Loves Turning Data Into Stories






Welcome to my portfolio. I am a data analyst who enjoys making sense of numbers and transforming them into valuable insights. I work with Python, R, SQL, and Tableau to explore data, uncover patterns, and create visuals that help people make smarter decisions.


In this portfolio, you will find some of my favorite projects. from digging deep into messy datasets, creating clean and meaningful analyses, to building dashboards that actually tell a story (not just look pretty). I’m always looking for new challenges, and I’m excited about opportunities where I can apply my skills, learn from others, and make an impact.


Take a look around, and if you like what you see, let’s connect!
